net.rollinginsanity.randomator

Class Randomator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.rollinginsanity.randomator.Randomator

  • public class Randomator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handles creating random names in the NSA style of adjective_noun.

    • Method Detail

      • getRandomName

        public java.lang.String getRandomName()
        Gets a random name. It calls the getRandomNameElement() function on our adjectives and nouns arrays.
        Returns:
        This returns the random name.

      • getRandomNameElement

        private java.lang.String getRandomNameElement(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> nameElement)
        This function gets an element from either the noun or adjective array. To be glued together elsewhere.
        Parameters:
        nameElement - An ArrayList containing the values we want to pick from randomly.
        Returns:
        This returns a random element from the ArrayList that was passed in.

      • getListFromResourceFile

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getListFromResourceFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Generates an arraylist from a list of lines in a resource file (in this case adjectives.txt and nouns.txt.)
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the resource file to load in to an ArrayList.
        Returns:
        An Arraylist containing the values from the resource file.
